pagination.invalid_page_number: You provided an invalid page number. Please provided a valid number from 1-{{maxPage}}

execution_failed.title: Command Failed
execution_failed.description: An error occured while excuting `{{commandName}}` command!

description.self: You don't have any saved profiles to execute this command
description.others: User doesn't have any saved profiles to execute this command

invalid_format.title: Invalid User ID or Ronin Address Format
invalid_format.description: Please provide a **Valid User ID** or **Ronin Address** format.

invalid_profile.title: Invalid User ID or Ronin Address Provided
invalid_profile.description: The User ID or Ronin Address provided doesn't have a valid profile.

missing_perms.title: Missing Permissions
missing_perms.description:
I don't have enough permissions to execute this command

errors.unauthorized_interaction:

You must execute the command on your own.
